alert.note: Alert for Harris; Muscogee; Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 28 at 4:07PM EDT until August 28 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Muscogee County in west central Georgia... Southeastern Troup County in west central Georgia... Harris County in west central Georgia... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 407 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Green Island Hills, or near Smiths, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Pine Mountain, Bibb City, Pine Mountain-Callaway Gardens, Goat Rock Lake, Edgewood, Flat Rock, Highland Park, Laurel Hills, Green Island Hills, Cataula, Columbus Metropolitan Airport, Rose Hill, Kenwood, Mountain Hill, Jones Crossroads, Bartletts Ferry Dam, Baughs Crossroads, Fortson, and Pine Mountain Valley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
